alert.note: Alert for Murray; Walker; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Murray, southern Whitfield, southeastern Walker and northwestern Gordon Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 245 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Eton to near Villanow, and moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dalton, Chatsworth, Eton, Resaca, Mill Creek, Dawnville, Villanow, Sugar Valley, Fort Mountain State Park, Tilton, and North Georgia Speedway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
